definition: The term "einstimmig" refers to a situation where a group of individuals or a collective body reaches a unanimous agreement or decision. It is commonly used to describe a consensus or a unanimous vote, indicating that all participants are in complete agreement or alignment.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft stimmte einstimmig f√ºr den neuen Trainer.
examples.english: The team voted unanimously for the new coach.

examples.german: Die Mitglieder waren sich einstimmig einig.
examples.english: The members were unanimously in agreement.

examples.german: Die Jury entschied einstimmig auf den Gewinner.
examples.english: The jury unanimously decided on the winner.
